Header: KONGU ENGINEERING COLLEGE PERUNDURAI ERODE-638060 (Autonomous)
Date: December 1, 2025
Type: Note
Subject: Kongu Engineering College – Faculty Quality Improvement Programme – Monetary benefit – sanction requested – reg.
Purpose: To encourage Faculty participation in Seminars, Conferences, Workshops, and Paper Presentations, monetary benefits are provided as detailed below.

STATE / NATIONAL LEVEL – Existing Policy:
(i) 100% reimbursement if expenses are upto Rs.2000. If exceeding Rs.2000, Rs.2000 plus 50% of excess provided.
(ii) 100% expenses reimbursed when deputed by KEC.

STATE / NATIONAL LEVEL – Recommended Policy:
(i) 100% reimbursement if registration fee upto Rs.3000. If exceeding Rs.3000, Rs.3000 plus 50% of excess provided.
(ii) 100% expenses reimbursed when deputed by KEC.

INTERNATIONAL LEVEL:
Existing: Rs.20,000 lump sum reimbursement.
Recommended: Rs.30,000 lump sum reimbursement.
Footer: Submitted for approval / Orders. Signed by Planning Cell, Principal, Correspondent, Secretary.

Header: KONGU ENGINEERING COLLEGE PERUNDURAI ERODE-638060 (Autonomous)
Date: December 1, 2025
Title: Note on Local Conveyance
Mileage Revision Proposal: Current allowance Rs.8 per km for own car usage. Proposed revision to Rs.10 per km for all distances plus Toll charges due to diesel/petrol price escalation.

Assistant Professors Eligibility:
Currently not eligible for own car usage. Faculty deputed for industry visits and consultancy. Group travel using own cars is cheaper. Government grant travel has no management burden.
Proposed:
(i) Assistant Professors in groups (minimum 2) may use own car with Principal approval.
(ii) Assistant Professors may use own car for Grant supported work with Principal approval.
Footer: Submitted for approval / Orders. Signed by Planning Cell, Principal, Correspondent, Secretary.
